name: G.R.O.W (Growth and Reduction avOidance Wing)
description:
Congratulations! You've been chosen as a test sub... erm, pilot, for our one of a kind size changing vehicle.

Use the buttons to grow and shrink in order to get past our obstacle course. However, our engineers are rather eccentric, deciding on an obfuscated ever-changing ship layout.

We promise there are no side effects.
